abstract: A deal with Jasper Wireless will help AT&T support a new generation of wireless devices, like e-readers, netbooks and navigation systems.
snippet: A deal with Jasper Wireless will help AT&T support a new generation of wireless devices, like e-readers, netbooks and navigation systems.
lead_paragraph: Glenn Lurie doesn’t know what the future looks like. But he’s in a hurry to get there.

headline.main: AT&T Plans for a Proliferation of Wireless Gadgets
